img_below_text:
## Non-Able Location
You can find Non-Able in a small, snowy clearing in the Brook of Bliss just below the small Pagoda. To get there, head to the Brook of Bliss Keeper's Shrine and take the stairs on the right. Head up the hill to the left until you reach the clearing outside the Pagoda. Turn left to find Non-Able tied up in the center of the snowy plain.

img_summary: The image depicts a scene from a snowy, mountainous area featuring a character tied up in front of a pagoda. This character, referred to as Non-Able, is central to the narrative and is found in a small clearing in the Brook of Bliss. The context suggests that Non-Able is a significant figure in the storyline, possibly requiring rescue or interaction.
